verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! man is a state of loss,

verses.text_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Save those who believe and do good works, and exhort one another to truth and exhort one another to endurance.
